channel.title: Removing Trees in 718
channel.description:
I've tried to remove a tree, which has partially worked.
The bottom of the tree has been removed, however the leaves still remain at the top. I have tried removing the space along the y axis 1 above and below the tree but this hasn't done anything.
How are you supposed to remove trees? This is what I'm currently doing (this removes the bottom half of the tree): [code]World.deleteObject(new WorldTile(3097, 3502, 0));[/code]
Any ideas how I can remove the top half?
Any help would be much appreciated.

item.title: Removing Trees in 718
item.dc:creator: @MoreWeed MoreWeed
item.description:
@MoreWeed wrote:

Thanks for the reply - I tried that and still didn’t work, I had to delete a plane that was next to the base of the tree and up one.

Read full topic

item.description:
@frozenfart wrote:

Add the both

The number 0 means height or something like that

Read full topic
